Poco

template < typename T >

struct TypeWrapper

Library: Foundation
Package: Core
Header: Poco/MetaProgramming.h

Description

Use the type wrapper if you want to decouple constness and references from template types.

Types

CONSTREFTYPE

typedef const T & CONSTREFTYPE;

CONSTTYPE

typedef const T CONSTTYPE;

REFTYPE

typedef T & REFTYPE;

TYPE

typedef T TYPE;
